params._member: The member to add as a member.
params._roleId: The role to add the member to.

params._adminRoleId: The role that is allowed to add and remove members from the role being created.
params._roleId: The id for role that is being created

hasRole(address,bytes32).return: Whether the member is a member of the role.

params._member: The member to remove as a member.
params._roleId: The role to remove the member from.
The id of the role being verified.

methods.constructor: The contract initializer. It adds NO_ROLE as with role id 0x0, and ROOT_ROLE with role id 'ROOT'.

hasRole(address,bytes32).notice: A method to verify whether an member is a member of a role

removeMember(address,bytes32).notice: A method to remove a member from a role

roleExists(bytes32).notice: A method to verify if a role exists.

userdoc.notice: Implements runtime configurable Role Based Access Control.
